original: ekasmin samaye bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati sma gṛdhrakūṭe parvate mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdhamardhatrayodaśabhirbhikṣusahasraiḥ saṃbahulaiśca bodhisattvamahāsattvaiḥ |

original: athāyuṣmān śāriputro maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat-adyātra śālistambamavalokya maitreya bhagavatā bhikṣubhyaḥ sūtramidamuktam-yo bhikṣavaḥ pratītyasamutpādaṃ paśyati,

original: evamukte maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ āyuṣmantaṃ śāradvatīputrametadavocat-atra yaduktaṃ bhadanta śāriputra bhagavatā dharmasvāminā sarvajñena-yo bhikṣavaḥ pratītyasamutpādaṃ paśyati,

tatra avidyā katamā

original: yā eṣāmeva ṣaṇṇāṃ dhātūnāmekasaṃjñā piṇḍasaṃjñā nityasaṃjñā dhruvasaṃjñā śāśvatasaṃjñā sukhasaṃjñā ātmasaṃjñā sattvajīvajantupoṣapuruṣapudgalasaṃjñā manujamānavasaṃjñā ahaṃkāramamakārasaṃjñā,
analyzed: yā eṣām eva ṣaṇṇām dhātūnām eka saṃjñā piṇḍa saṃjñā nitya saṃjñā dhruva saṃjñā śāśvata saṃjñā sukha saṃjñā ātma saṃjñā sattva jīva jantu poṣa puruṣa pudgala saṃjñā manuja mānava saṃjñā ahaṃkāra mamakāra saṃjñā
evamādi vividham ajñānam
iyam ucyate avidyā iti
evam avidyāyām satyām viṣayeṣu rāga dveṣa mohāḥ pravartante
tatra ye rāga dveṣa mohāḥ viṣayeṣu
amī avidyā pratyayāḥ
saṃskārāḥ iti ucyante
vastu prativijñaptiḥ vijñānam
vijñāna sahabhuvaḥ catvāraḥ skandhāḥ arūpiṇaḥ upādāna ākhyāḥ tat nāma

original: rūpaṃ catvāri mahābhūtāni tāni copādāya rūpam |
analyzed: rūpam catvāri mahābhūtāni tāni ca upādāya rūpam
tat ca nāma tat ca rūpam aikadhyam abhisaṃkṣipya tat nāma rūpam
nāma rūpa saṃniśritāni indriyāṇi ṣaṣ āyatanam
trayāṇām dharmāṇām saṃnipātaḥ sparśaḥ
sparśa anubhavaḥ vedanā
vedanā adhyavasānam tṛṣṇā
tṛṣṇā vaipulyam upādānam
upādāna nirjātam punarbhava janakam karma bhavaḥ
bhava hetukaḥ skandha prādurbhāvaḥ jātiḥ
jātasya skandha paripākaḥ jarā
jīrṇasya skandhasya vināśaḥ maraṇam
mriyamāṇasya saṃmūḍhasya sa abhiṣvaṅgasya antar paridāhaḥ śokaḥ
śoka uttham ālapanam paridevaḥ
pañca vijñānakāya saṃyuktam asātam anubhavanam duḥkham
manasikāra saṃyuktam mānasam duḥkham daurmanasyam
ye ca api anye evamādayaḥ kleśāḥ
te upāyāsāḥ iti
tatra mahā andhakāra arthena avidyā
abhisaṃskāra arthena saṃskārāḥ
vijñāpana arthena vijñānam
anyonya upastambhana arthena nāma rūpam
āya dvāra arthena ṣaṣ āyatanam
sparśana arthena sparśaḥ
anubhavana arthena vedanā
paritarṣaṇa arthena tṛṣṇā
upādāna arthena upādānam
punarbhava janana arthena bhavaḥ
skandha prādurbhāva arthena jātiḥ
skandha paripāka arthena jarā
vināśa arthena maraṇam
śocana arthena śokaḥ
vacana paridevanā arthena paridevaḥ
kāya saṃpīḍana arthena duḥkham
citta saṃpīḍana arthena daurmanasyam
upakleśa arthena upāyāsāḥ
punar aparam tattve pratipattiḥ mithyā pratipattiḥ ajñānam avidyā

original: evamavidyāyāṃ satyāṃ trividhāḥ saṃskārā abhinirvartante-puṇyopagā apuṇyopagā āneñjyopagāḥ |
analyzed: evam avidyāyām satyām trividhāḥ saṃskārāḥ abhinirvartante puṇya upagāḥ apuṇya upagāḥ āneñjya upagāḥ

original: tatra puṇyopagānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ puṇyopagameva vijñānaṃ bhavati |
analyzed: tatra puṇya upagānām saṃskārāṇām puṇya upagam iva vijñānam bhavati
a puṇya upagānām saṃskārāṇām a puṇya upagam iva vijñānam bhavati
āneñjya upagānām saṃskārāṇām āneñjya upagam iva vijñānam bhavati
idam ucyate saṃskāra pratyayam vijñānam iti
vijñāna sahabhuvaḥ catvāraḥ rūpiṇaḥ skandhāḥ nāma rūpam
tad vijñāna pratyayam nāma rūpam ucyate
nāma rūpa vivṛddhyā ṣaḍbhiḥ āyatana dvāraiḥ kṛtya kriyāḥ pravartante
tat nāma rūpa pratyayam ṣaṣ āyatanam iti ucyate
ṣaḍbhyaḥ ca āyatanebhyaḥ ṣaṭ sparśa kāyāḥ pravartante
ayam ṣaṣ āyatana pratyayaḥ sparśaḥ iti ucyate
yad jātīyaḥ sparśaḥ bhavati
tad jātīyā vedanā pravartate
iyam ucyate sparśa pratyayā vedanā iti

original: yastāṃ vedanāṃ viśeṣeṇāsvādayati abhinandati adhyavasyati adhyavasāya tiṣṭhati,
analyzed: yaḥ tām vedanām viśeṣeṇa āsvādayati abhinandati adhyavasyati adhyavasāya tiṣṭhati
sā vedanā pratyayā tṛṣṇā iti ucyate
āsvādana abhinandana adhyavasāna adhyavasāya sthānāt ātma priya rūpa sāta rūpaiḥ viyogaḥ mā bhūt iti nityam a parityāgāya yā evam prārthanā
idam ucyate tṛṣṇā pratyayam upādānam

original: evaṃ prārthayamānaḥ punarbhavajanakaṃ karma samutthāpayati kāyena vācā manasā ca,
analyzed: evam prārthayamānaḥ punarbhava janakam karma samutthāpayati kāyena vācā manasā ca
saḥ upādāna pratyayaḥ bhavaḥ iti ucyate
tad karma nirjātānām pañca skandhānām abhinirvṛttiḥ yā
sā bhava pratyayā jātiḥ iti ucyate
jātyā abhinirvṛttānām skandhānām upacayana paripākāt vināśaḥ bhavati
tat idam jāti pratyayam jarā maraṇam iti ucyate
evam ayam dvādaśa aṅgaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ anyonya hetukaḥ anyonya pratyayaḥ

original: na nityo nānityo na saṃskṛto nāsaṃskṛto nāhetuko nāpratyayo na vedayitā na kṣayadharmo na vināśadharmo na nirodhadharmo'nādikālapravṛtto'nucchinno'pravartate nadīsrotavat ||
analyzed: na nityaḥ na anityaḥ na saṃskṛtaḥ na asaṃskṛtaḥ na ahetukaḥ na apratyayaḥ na vedayitā na kṣaya dharmaḥ na vināśa dharmaḥ na nirodha dharmaḥ na ādi kāla pravṛttaḥ unucchinnaḥ pravartate nadī srota vat
yadi ayam dvādaśa aṅgaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ nyonya hetukaḥ nyonya pratyayaḥ

original: na nityo nānityo na saṃskṛto nāsaṃskṛto nāhetuko nāpratyayo na vedayitā na kṣayadharmo na vināśadharmo na nirodhadharmo'nādikālapravṛtto'nucchinno'nupravartate
analyzed: na nityaḥ na anityaḥ na saṃskṛtaḥ na asaṃskṛtaḥ na ahetukaḥ na apratyayaḥ na vedayitā na kṣaya dharmaḥ na vināśa dharmaḥ na nirodha dharmaḥ na ādi kāla pravṛttaḥ na ucchinnaḥ nupravartate

original: atha ca imānyasya dvādaśāṅgasya pratītyasamutpādasya catvāri aṅgāni saṃghātakriyāyai hetutvena pravartante |
analyzed: atha ca imāni asya dvādaśa aṅgasya pratītyasamutpādasya catvāri aṅgāni saṃghāta kriyāyai hetu tvena pravartante
katamāni catvāri

original: yaduta avidyā tṛṣṇā karma vijñānaṃ ca |
analyzed: yat uta avidyā tṛṣṇā karma vijñānam ca
tatra vijñānam bīja svabhāva tvena hetuḥ
karma kṣetra svabhāvena hetuḥ
avidyā tṛṣṇā ca kleśa svabhāva tvena hetuḥ
tatra karma kleśāḥ vijñāna bījam janayanti
tatra karma vijñāna bījasya kṣetra kāryam karoti
tṛṣṇā vijñāna bījam snehayati
avidyā vijñāna bījam avakirati
asatām eṣām pratyayānām vijñāna bījasya abhinirvṛttiḥ na bhavati

original: tatra karmaṇo naivaṃ bhavati-ahaṃ vijñānabījasya kṣetrakāryaṃ karomīti |
analyzed: tatra karmaṇaḥ na evam bhavati aham vijñāna bījasya kṣetra kāryam karomi iti

original: tṛṣṇāyā api naivaṃ bhavati-ahaṃ vijñānabījaṃ snehayāmīti |
analyzed: tṛṣṇāyāḥ api na evam bhavati aham vijñāna bījam snehayāmi iti
avidyāyāḥ api na evam bhavati aham vijñāna bījam avakirāmi iti
vijñāna bījasya api na evam bhavati aham ebhiḥ pratyayaiḥ janitam iti

original: atha ca vijñānabījaṃ karmakṣetrapratiṣṭhitaṃ tṛṣṇāsnehābhiṣyanditamavidyayā svavakīrṇaṃ virohati |
analyzed: atha ca vijñāna bījam karma kṣetra pratiṣṭhitam tṛṣṇā sneha abhiṣyanditam avidyayā su avakīrṇam virohati
tatra tatra upapatti āyatana pratisaṃdhau mātuḥ kukṣau nāma rūpa aṅkuram abhinirvartayati

original: sa ca nāmarūpāṅkuro na svayaṃkṛto na parakṛto nobhayakṛto neśvarakṛto na kālapariṇāmito na prakṛtisaṃbhūto na caikakāraṇādhīno nāpyahetusamutpannaḥ
analyzed: sa ca nāma rūpa aṅkuraḥ na svayaṃkṛtaḥ na para kṛtaḥ na ubhaya kṛtaḥ na īśvara kṛtaḥ na kāla pariṇāmitaḥ na prakṛti saṃbhūtaḥ na ca eka kāraṇa adhīnaḥ na api ahetu samutpannaḥ

original: atha ca mātāpitṛsaṃyogadṛtusamavāyādanyeṣāṃ ca pratyayānāṃ samavāyāt tatra tatra āsvādaviddhaṃ vijñānabījamupapattyāyatanapratisaṃghau mātuḥ kukṣau nāmarūpāṅkuramabhinirvartayati,
analyzed: atha ca mātā pitṛ saṃyoga dṛtu samavāyāt anyeṣām ca pratyayānām samavāyāt tatra tatra āsvāda viddham vijñāna bījam upapatti āyatana pratisaṃghau mātuḥ kukṣau nāma rūpa aṅkuram abhinirvartayati

original: asvāmikeṣu dharmeṣu amameṣu aparigraheṣu ākāśasameṣu māyālakṣaṇasvabhāveṣu hetupratyayānāmavaikalyāt |
analyzed: asvāmikeṣu dharmeṣu amameṣu aparigraheṣu ākāśa sameṣu māyā lakṣaṇa svabhāveṣu hetu pratyayānām a vaikalyāt
tat yathā pañcabhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ cakṣuḥ vijñānam utpadyate
katamaiḥ pañcabhiḥ

original: yaduta cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpaṃ ca ālokaṃ ca ākāśaṃ ca tajjamanasikāraṃ ca pratītya utpadyate cakṣurvijñānam |
analyzed: yat uta cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpam ca ālokam ca ākāśam ca tad ja manasikāram ca pratītya utpadyate cakṣuḥ vijñānam
tatra cakṣuḥ vijñānasya cakṣuḥ āśraya kṛtyam karoti
rūpam cakṣuḥ vijñānasya ālambana kṛtyam karoti
ālokaḥ avabhāsa kṛtyam karoti
ākāśam an āvaraṇa kṛtyam karoti
tad ja manasikāraḥ samanvāhāra kṛtyam karoti
asatām eṣām pratyayānām cakṣuḥ vijñānam na utpadyate
yadā tu cakṣuḥ ādhyātmikam āyatanam avikalam bhavati
evam rūpa āloka ākāśa tad ja manasikārāḥ ca avikalāḥ bhavanti
tatas sarveṣām samavāyāt cakṣuḥ vijñānam utpadyate

original: tatra cakṣuṣo naivaṃ bhavati-ahaṃ cakṣurvijñānasyāśrayakṛtyaṃ karomīti |
analyzed: tatra cakṣuṣaḥ na evam bhavati aham cakṣuḥ vijñānasya āśraya kṛtyam karomi iti

original: rūpasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati-ahaṃ cakṣurvijñānasya ālambanakṛtyaṃ karomīti |
analyzed: rūpasya api na evam bhavati aham cakṣuḥ vijñānasya ālambana kṛtyam karomi iti

original: ālokasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati-ahaṃ cakṣurvijñānasya avabhāsakṛtyaṃ karomīti |
analyzed: ālokasya api na evam bhavati aham cakṣuḥ vijñānasya avabhāsa kṛtyam karomi iti

original: ākāśasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati-ahaṃ cakṣurvijñānasya anāvaraṇakṛtyaṃ karomīti |
analyzed: ākāśasya api na evam bhavati aham cakṣuḥ vijñānasya an āvaraṇa kṛtyam karomi iti

original: tajjamanasikārasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati-ahaṃ cakṣurvijñānasya samanvāhārakṛtyaṃ karomīti |
analyzed: tad ja manasikārasya api na evam bhavati aham cakṣuḥ vijñānasya samanvāhāra kṛtyam karomi iti
cakṣuḥ vijñānasya api na evam bhavati aham ebhiḥ pratyayaiḥ janitam iti

original: atha ca punaḥ satsu eṣu pratyayeṣu cakṣurvijñānasyotpattirbhavati |
analyzed: atha ca punar satsu eṣu pratyayeṣu cakṣuḥ vijñānasya utpattiḥ bhavati
evam śeṣāṇām indriyāṇām yathāyogam yojyam
tatra na kaścid dharmaḥ asmāt lokāt para lokam saṃkrāmati
asti ca karma phala prativijñaptiḥ
hetu pratyayānām avaikalyāt
tat yathā su pariśuddhe ādarśa maṇḍale mukha pratibimbakam dṛśyate

original: na ca tatra ādarśamaṇḍale mukhaṃ saṃkrāmati |
analyzed: na ca tatra ādarśa maṇḍale mukham saṃkrāmati
asti ca mukha prativijñaptiḥ
hetu pratyayānām avaikalyāt
evam asmāt lokāt na kaścid cyutaḥ
na api anyatra upapannaḥ
asti ca karma phala prativijñaptiḥ
hetu pratyayānām avaikalyāt
tat yathā candra maṇḍalam catvāriṃśat yojana śatam ūrdhvam vrajati

original: atha ca punaḥ parītte'bhyudakabhājane candrasya pratibimbaṃ dṛśyate |
analyzed: atha ca punar parīttebhiḥ udaka bhājane candrasya pratibimbam dṛśyate
na ca candra maṇḍalam tasmāt sthānāt cyutam
parītte udakasya bhājane saṃkrāntam bhavati
asti ca candra maṇḍala prativijñaptiḥ
hetu pratyayānām avaikalyāt
evam asmāt lokāt na kaścid cyutaḥ
na api anyatra upapannaḥ
asti ca karma phala prativijñaptiḥ
hetu pratyayānām avaikalyāt
tat yathā agniḥ upādāna pratyaye sati jvalati
upādāna vaikalyāt na jvalati

original: evameva karmakleśajanitaṃ vijñānabījaṃ tatra tatra upapattyāyatanapratisaṃghau mātuḥ kukṣau nāmarūpāṅkuramabhinirvartayati,
analyzed: evam eva karma kleśa janitam vijñāna bījam tatra tatra upapatti āyatana pratisaṃghau mātuḥ kukṣau nāma rūpa aṅkuram abhinirvartayati

original: asvāmikeṣu dharmeṣu amameṣu aparigraheṣu ākāśasameṣu māyālakṣaṇasvabhāveṣu hetupratyayānāmavaikalyāt |
analyzed: asvāmikeṣu dharmeṣu amameṣu aparigraheṣu ākāśa sameṣu māyā lakṣaṇa svabhāveṣu hetu pratyayānām a vaikalyāt
evam ādhyātmikasya pratītyasamutpādasya pratyaya upanibandhaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ
tatra ādhyātmikaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ pañcabhiḥ ākāraiḥ draṣṭavyaḥ
katamaiḥ pañcabhiḥ
na śāśvatataḥ
na ucchedataḥ
na saṃkrāntitaḥ
parītta hetutaḥ vipula phala abhinirvṛttataḥ
tad sadṛśa anuprabandhataḥ ca iti
katham na śāśvatataḥ
yasmāt anye māraṇa antikāḥ skandhāḥ
anye aupapatti aṃśikāḥ skandhāḥ

original: na tu ya evaṃ māraṇāntikāḥ skandhāḥ,
analyzed: na tu ye evam māraṇa antikāḥ skandhāḥ
te eva aupapattyaṃśikāḥ
api tu māraṇa antikāḥ skandhāḥ nirudhyante

original: tasminneva ca samaye aupapattyaṃśikāḥ skandhāḥ prādurbhavanti |
analyzed: tasmin eva ca samaye aupapatti aṃśikāḥ skandhāḥ prādurbhavanti
atas na śāśvatataḥ
katham na ucchedataḥ

original: na ca pūrvaniruddheṣu māraṇāntikeṣu skandheṣu aupapattyaṃśikāḥ skandhāḥ prādurbhavanti,
analyzed: na ca pūrva niruddheṣu māraṇa antikeṣu skandheṣu aupapatti aṃśikāḥ skandhāḥ prādurbhavanti
na api aniruddheṣu
api tu māraṇa antikāḥ skandhāḥ nirudhyante

original: tasminneva ca samaye aupapattyaṃśikāḥ skandhāḥ prādurbhavanti tulādaṇḍonnāmāvanāmavat |
analyzed: tasmin eva ca samaye aupapatti aṃśikāḥ skandhāḥ prādurbhavanti tulā daṇḍa unnāma avanāma vat
atas na ucchedataḥ
katham na saṃkrāntitaḥ
visadṛśāḥ sattva nikāyāḥ sa bhāgāyām jātyām jātim abhinirvartayanti
atas na saṃkrāntitaḥ
katham parītta hetutaḥ vipula phala abhinirvṛttitaḥ
parīttam karma kriyate
vipulaḥ phala vipākaḥ anubhūyate
atas parītta hetutaḥ vipula phala abhinirvṛttitaḥ
katham tad sadṛśa anuprabandhataḥ
yathāvedanīyam karma kriyate
tathā vedanīyaḥ vipākaḥ anubhūyate
atas tad sadṛśa anuprabandhataḥ ca
evam ādhyātmikaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ pañcabhiḥ ākāraiḥ draṣṭavyaḥ

original: yaḥ kaścid bhadanta śāriputra imaṃ pratītyasamutpādaṃ bhagavatā samyakpraṇītamevaṃ yathābhūtaṃ samyakprajñayā satatasamitamajīvaṃ nirjīvaṃ yathāvadaviparītamajātamabhūtamakṛtamasaṃskṛtamapratighamanālambaṃ śivamabhayamanāhāryamavyayamavyupaśamasvabhāvaṃ paśyati,
analyzed: yaḥ kaścid bhadanta śāriputra imam pratītyasamutpādam bhagavatā samyak praṇītam evam yathābhūtam samyak prajñayā satata samitam ajīvam nirjīvam yathāvat aviparītam ajātam abhūtam akṛtam asaṃskṛtam apratigham anālambam śivam abhayam anāhāryam avyayam avyupaśama svabhāvam paśyati

original: asataḥ tucchataḥ riktataḥ asārataḥ rogataḥ gaṇḍataḥ śalyataḥ aghataḥ anityataḥ duḥkhataḥ śūnyataḥ anātmataḥ samanupaśyati,
analyzed: asataḥ tucchataḥ riktataḥ asārataḥ rogataḥ gaṇḍataḥ śalyataḥ aghataḥ anityataḥ duḥkhataḥ śūnyataḥ anātmataḥ samanupaśyati
na sa pūrva antam pratisarati kim nu aham abhūvam atīta idhvani
katham nu aham abhūvam atīta idhvani iti

original: aparāntaṃ vā na punaḥ pratisarati-kiṃ nvahaṃ bhaviṣyāmyanāgate'dhvani,
analyzed: apara antam vā na punar pratisarati kim nu aham bhaviṣyāmi anāgata idhvani
āhosvit na bhaviṣyāmi anāgata idhvani
kaḥ nu bhaviṣyāmi anāgatedhvani
katham nu bhaviṣyāmi anāgatedhvani iti
pratyutpannam vā punar nam pratisarati kim nu idam
katham nu idam
ke santaḥ ke bhaviṣyāmaḥ
ime sattvāḥ kutas āgatāḥ
itas cyutāḥ kutra gamiṣyanti iti

original: yāni ekeṣāṃ śramaṇabrāhmaṇānāṃ pṛthag loke dṛṣṭigatāni bhaviṣyanti,
analyzed: yāni ekeṣām śramaṇa brāhmaṇānām pṛthak loke dṛṣṭi gatāni bhaviṣyanti

original: tadyathā-ātmavādapratisaṃyuktāni sattvavādapratisaṃyuktāni jīvavādapratisaṃyuktāni pudgalavādapratisaṃyuktāni kautukamaṅgalavādapratisaṃyuktāni unmiñjitāni nimiñjitāni ca,
analyzed: tat yathā ātma vāda pratisaṃyuktāni sattva vāda pratisaṃyuktāni jīva vāda pratisaṃyuktāni pudgala vāda pratisaṃyuktāni kautukamaṅgala vāda pratisaṃyuktāni unmiñjitāni nimiñjitāni ca

original: tānyasya tasmin samaye prahīṇāni bhavanti parijñātāni samucchinnamūlāni tālamastakavadanābhāsagatāni āyatyāmanutpādānirodhadharmāṇi ||
analyzed: tāni asya tasmin samaye prahīṇāni bhavanti parijñātāni samucchinna mūlāni tāla mastaka vadana ābhāsa gatāni āyatyām anutpāda anirodha dharmāṇi

original: yo bhadanta śāriputra evaṃvidhadharmakṣāntisamanvitaḥ pratītyasamutpādaṃ samyagavagacchati,
analyzed: yaḥ bhadanta śāriputraḥ evaṃvidha dharma kṣānti samanvitaḥ pratītyasamutpādam samyak avagacchati

original: tasya tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavit puruṣadamyasārathiranattaraḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān samyaksaṃbodhiṃ vyākaroti-samyaksaṃbuddho buddho bhaviṣyasīti |
analyzed: tasya tathāgataḥ ūrhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ vidyā caraṇa saṃpannaḥ sugataḥ loka vid puruṣa damya sārathiḥ anattaraḥ śāstā deva manuṣyāṇām buddhaḥ bhagavān samyaksaṃbodhim vyākaroti samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ buddhaḥ bhaviṣyasi iti
maitreyeṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena evam uktam

original: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputro maitreyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bhāṣitamabhinandya anupramodya utthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ |
analyzed: atha khalu āyuṣmān śāriputraḥ maitreyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bhāṣitam abhinandya anupramodya utthāya āsanāt prakrāntaḥ
prakrāntāḥ te ca bhikṣavaḥ
ārya śālistambam nāma mahāyāna sūtram saṃpūrṇam
